The Secret Of Palm Beach Is Revealed
Intimate and Exclusive Drinking, Dining & Entertainment
About Red Light Palm Beach
The Best Kept Secret in Palm Beach County
O
nce granted entry via a secret coded door, you‚Äôll enter into a prohibition-era inspired bar where you‚Äôll find a beautifully outfitted interior where every detail has been carefully considered. You‚Äôll feel as if you‚Äôve transported back to a different era as you explore the space, which is furnished with swanky chairs and fine details throughout. We take you back to a place in time where service was paramount and the bartenders knew your name and drink of choice before you are even seated.
Red Light provides the perfect setting for a date, birthday party, special event, or a casual night with friends. We take great pride in our famous cuisine, which has been named as the ‚ÄúBest Fine Dining in Palm Beach County and West Palm Beach‚Äù.
Our full menu is prepared fresh daily and made-to-order. Hand-cut steaks, fresh oysters, a fine selection of imported cheese, and in-house prepared sauces, are just a few of the amazing features you will find on our dinner menu. You can sip on an expertly crafted beverage while enjoying the sounds and atmosphere of times past. Each seasonal cocktail menu is the product of innovation, creativity, and care, boasting of fresh produce and house-made ingredients. Looking for a smoked Manhattan, cucumber martini, or French 75, look no further, Red Light has the spirits to enhance your night.
Make a Reservation at Red Light Palm Beach

Red Light Palm Beach Palm Beach 75
Red Light Palm Beach Pom Rita
Red Light Palm Beach Red Light Old Fashioned
Highly recommend! We were looking for a speak easy and came across this gem. The ambiance was perfectly set with the lighting, live jazz, craft cocktails, mouth watering food and our amazing server Talia. She delivered exceptional service, catering to all our needs with such fun energy. She recommended the pork belly which was incredible then had the stuffed pork chop and the halibut for dinner which was so delicious. After dinner Julian recommended the chocolate chip bread pudding and it was to die for. Definitely will be back soon!
Kimberly Wolters
May 27, 2021
So fancy. Friendly staff. Love this place.
Anna Lepeley
March 8, 2021
This is a great location for that individual or couple that seeks that VIP feel and high end dining experience. I went on a Sunday when they feature comedians. The comedians were great and I will definitely be going back.
Josh Velez
February 15, 2021
This file should primarily consist of HTML with a little bit of PHP.
Bobby Mac's comedy night was a blast. Funny comedians, great food, laughed till it hurt. Sunday Night at Red Light is my new spot.
Michael J DeSuno
November 16, 2020
The comedy show on Sunday‚Äôs is amazing
Michael Panzeca
November 16, 2020
Awesome new concept! Not too many places like this around and def not any this cool in South Florida. Live jazzy music and low sexy lighting creates the perfect ambience to discreetly let loose and enjoy yourself in comfort. The food and menu selection was great and the service was superb! Ask for Gemma, she sure is a gem üíé Love this place, will definitely be frequenting often üòç
Amanda Tulucci Uys
October 14, 2020
This file should primarily consist of HTML with a little bit of PHP.
Food was amazing as always and the service was nothing short of being perfect.
Danny Rodriguez
October 12, 2020
What an experience. Red light is exactly what it is, a speakeasy. A hidden gem in plain sight, one might wonder the shenanigans you‚Äôre off to. But you‚Äôre enjoying a cocktail (or two) and a meal. The food is on a different level. The ambience puts you right back in the 1920‚Äôs in the most wonderful way. Date night, girls night, guys night, or just a night - Red Light is a wonderful escape from reality.
Matthew Smidowicz
October 10, 2020
Amazing food and ambiance! Can‚Äôt wait to go back with my friends for pom margaritas and dinner. Also had wonderful live jazz music!
Holly Shivery
October 5, 2020
This file should primarily consist of HTML with a little bit of PHP.
The Red Light Palm Beach was an amazing experience. The ambiance was sultry, sophisticated and totally relaxing. The dim lights and luxurious
decor created the perfect place to unwind and
indulge the senses while waiting for the feast
fit for a king. The magnificent Tomahawk steak
arrived with the chef who sliced it to perfection.
Our waiter Kyle new exactly how I wanted it
Pittsburgh style, very impressive! The Mac and
Cheese side was stocked with chunks of fresh
Lobster, Outrageous!  My guest had Alaskan
King Crab legs that were tender and delicious.
During our meal we enjoyed music by saxophonist
Scott St John, great guy very entertaining. The staff
Repeatedly visited our table to fulfill our every
desire. Overall a magnificent experience!
Thanks Joe B and the entire staff.

Response from the owner
4 hours ago
Thank you Louis for this AWESOME review. Hope to see you again, soon.
Luigi Russo
October 5, 2020
It‚Äôs sexy everything about it. Great date place. Food is wonderful I worked on Wall Street we went everywhere and ate everything and drank too.  The steaks are as good if not better especially the presentation that Lugers or Morton fun smoky drinks and you get treated like a rock star!
Carol Lizza
September 25, 2020
Love this place ! Great vibe !
Food was sooooo good def recommend the lamb chops ! Management and our waitress were super friendly and professional! See you again soon üôÇ
Jovany Gio Black
September 24, 2020
